text: Helane Freeman (born September 25, 1964 in Los Angeles, California) is an American art director and artist, best known for the album Straight Outta Compton. Helane also is credited on the albums Livin' Like Hustlers and The California Raisins. She has also worked in film and television on such productions as Hannah Montana, The Suite Life of Zack and Cody, Cory in the House, The Closer, The Perfect Game, and Death Match. She currently lives in Agoura Hills, California. ==External links== * * at Allmusic.com Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:American artists
title: Helane Freeman
